title: The rights you might not realize you have - Shannon Odell

multiple-choice.question: What is the main reason behind young plaintiffs suing their governments around the world since 2015?

options.label: A
options.text: To advocate for better education systems

options.label: B
options.text: To tackle climate change and environmental inaction

multiple-choice.question: Which document, adopted by the United Nations in 1948, describes the inherent freedoms that belong to all people?

options.label: B
options.text: The Universal Declaration of Human Rights (UDHR)

multiple-choice.question: What type of rights are included in the Universal Declaration of Human Rights?

options.label: B
options.text: Only freedom of thought and political liberties

options.label: C
options.text: A combination of freedom of thought, political liberties, and socioeconomic and cultural rights

multiple-choice.question: In which year did the Colombian Supreme Court rule in favor of young plaintiffs, finding the government was legally obliged to reduce deforestation and greenhouse gas emissions?
How many countries and jurisdictions have enshrined the right to a healthy environment into national legislation?
What is the predicted outcome if rapid and significant change is not made to address climate change?

options.label: A
options.text: The planet will experience a slight increase in temperature

options.label: B
options.text: The planet is at risk of mass extinction, which could wipe out a quarter of the world's biodiversity by 2100

options.label: C
options.text: The planet will experience more frequent natural disasters

options.label: D
options.text: The planet will experience a decrease in greenhouse gas emissions

multiple-choice.question: What is the name of the court case in which 25 young Colombians sued their government for failing to reduce deforestation in the Amazon and falling short on climate promises?

options.label: C
options.text: The case is not specifically named in the transcript

multiple-choice.question: Which of the following is NOT a consequence of declining natural ecosystems?

options.label: C
options.text: Leaving humanity more vulnerable to disease
